mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users ( username, password, gender, styles, phone, email, address, avatar_file_name, created_at ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{password}, #{gender}, #{styles,typeHandler=com.food.handler.ListToStringTypeHandler}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{address}, #{avatarFileName}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT id, username, password, gender, styles, phone, email, address, avatar_file_name AS avatarFileName, created_at AS createdAt FROM users WHERE username = #{username}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE username = #{username}
SELECT id, username, email, phone, status, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE users SET username = #{username}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, gender = #{gender}, address = #{address} WHERE id = #{id}
